column1: leg-stump line, and the batsman misses the flick off his hips. Hits his front thigh
good length on middle, and jagging into Chari's body. He mistimes a nudge to the leg side off his hips
full on off, and Chari gets onto the front foot to cover his off stump. Shoulders his arms thereafter as the ball flies into Sarfraz's gloves
big appeal for lbw, but not given! That was close. Landed on a length on off, and then came inwards to hit Chari on the front leg. Would've gone over off stump, perhaps
full outside off, and angling across Chari's body. He takes a step forward and shoulders his arms after that
full on off, and shaping away after pitching. Driven square to point
appeal first ball, but it's a muted one. Full on middle, and Chari bat-pads this onto his legs
back of a length outside leg stump, and Chari tries to pull this fine down the leg side. He misses, and Sarfraz intercepts from way beyond leg
back of a length outside leg stump, but angled into Chari's body. He can't tap it away on the leg side, and the rising ball hits his chest region
good length on middle, and Chari punches a back-foot drive to mid on with ease
good length on off, and he rides the bounce to punch to cover on this occasion. Finds the infielder once again
full on off, and defended to cover off the front foot
no they can't. Full on off, and he defends this with the angled bat to midwicket
good length on middle, but the ball stays low to Chibhabha! He's forced to bend his knees and somehow get bat to ball from in front of off stump. Danger averted
length ball on middle, and he tries to drive across the line. Mistimes it to midwicket
good length on off, and he taps it off the back foot to point. Finds the fielder once again
goes short! Lands outside leg, and flies over Chibhabha's helmet. He didn't even bother ducking because the ball was so short
good length outside off, and Chibhabha tries to steer this to third man. But his late dab finds the fielder at point once again
good length on off, and Chibhabha defends off the front foot. Played to the off side

big shout for lbw! But not given by the umpire. It was a full delivery that Chibhabha couldn't flick to the leg side. Did it pitch outside leg? That's the only question the umpire had to deal with there. Probably the correct decision
good length on middle, and firmly defended by Chari off the back foot. Tapped back to the bowler
good length on middle, and defended off the front foot. Played with soft hands, ensuring the ball stays on the ground
good length outside off, and swinging away from Chari! He tries to fish at this away from his body, and the moving ball finds the bat's outside edge. Sarfraz makes no mistake
good length delivery on off, and going across the captain's body. Left alone
full on off, and Masakadza comes forward to defend. Played to cover
length ball outside off, and through to Sarfraz's gloves. No shot offered
full, and wide outside off, and Chibhabha shuffles across to the off side and cuts this very square!
length ball on leg, and Chibhabha nudges this off the front foot to midwicket. Can't pierce the gap
full on middle, and that's been positively driven off the front foot. Played away from cover, and they can take off for a single
full outside off, and that's been drilled through the covers. Takes a big stride forward, and leans into this slapshot
length ball on off, and angling across Masakadza. Left alone by the captain
good length on middle, and the tall man rides the bounce to defend off the front foot
full just outside off, and Chibhabha plays a late cut to the gap on the off side. They scamper across for one
good length on middle, but taking a banana swing across the batsman's body! Masakadza sticks his bat out, and taps this to the off side rather tentatively
good length on off, and takes a lot of bounce after pitching. Masakadza shuffles across and tries to punch at it, but the ball swings away from him, and goes through to Safraz
full on off, and the outswinger is driven to the fielder near cover
good length on off, and Masakadza takes a big stride forward to cover his off stump. Shoulders his arms thereafter
full on middle, and that's been driven through the off side! Played with the angled bat, and shoveled past mid on for a boundary
full, and very wide outside off. Chibhabha reaches at it, and tries to drive, but he can only mistime his shot to the bowler
short and wide! Chibhabha tries to cut it through point, but the ball goes over his bat. Zimbabwe will feel like they've missed out
good length on off, and tapped to point off the back foot
good length outside off, and Chibhabha falls forward trying to defend off the front foot
full just outside off, and Chibhabha comes forward to defend. Played back to Faheem
length outside off, and cut away to cover point. Sweet sound of the bat, and Asif Ali misfields on the circle. He leaks an extra run, and boy, Sarfraz gives him the world famous stare!

under edged! It was too full for the cut, and the ball sneaks under his bat as Chibhabha tries to play this square. The ball was very low, and Sarfraz did an excellent job to dive diagonally forward to collect
length ball on leg stump, and all Musakanda can do is defend it to the leg side
good length on off, and that's been run down to third man off the back foot. Steered carefully between second slip and gully
back of a length on middle, and flies into Sarfraz's gloves as the batsman sways away
good length on off, and tapped away off the back foot. Played to point
full outside off, and Masakanda shoulders his arms. Escorts the ball into Sarfraz's gloves
good length on off, and pushed to the off side from behind the crease
good length outside off, and Musakanda tries to cut this hard. Perhaps too hard, and the ball sneaks under his bat
good length outside off, and that's been defended with soft hands. Played back to the bowler
good length outside off, and defended once again off the front foot. Played to the off side with the angled bat
almost cleans up the umpire! Full outside off, but Musakanda drags this straight past umpire Russell Tiffin for a boundary
full outside off, and defended away to backward point to see the over out
good length on off, and Masakadza runs this down to third man off the back foot. An easy jog across to the other side
back of a length on middle, and angling across the batsman. Musakanda tries to cut, and misses the shot, which makes Usman want to appeal for caught-behind. His team-mates don't join in though
good length on off, and defended off the front foot to the leg side
length ball on middle, but Musakanda had walked across to the off side to meet the ball near his toes. Taps this down the ground to midwicket with soft hands, and races off for a quick single
back of a length on leg, and Masakadza shovels this to midwicket for another single. Played from near his chest
full on middle, and defended back past the non-striker
good length outside off, and left alone by Masakadza
full and wide outsidde off. Masakadza could've leant into a drive, but he chooses not to play at it. Shoulders his arms
good length outside off, and punched away to cover off the front foot. Can't find the gap though
full on off, and angling into his pads. Driven back to Faheem off the front foot
good length on off, and punched down the ground to mid on. No chance of a single
good length on middle, and defended off the front foot. Pushed to mid on and that's the end of a maiden over
full on off, and pushed past the bowler to mid on. A nice and early call from the batsman for a single
pulled away! Back of a length on leg, and the big man has no trouble in putting this away. Goes to the boundary in no time
almost chopped on! Length ball on off, and he tries to dab it down to third man. Too close to his body, so the ball finds an underedge and almost cleans up his leg stump
full outside off, and driven away from his body to cover. Straight to Imam there, but he misfields, and that allows the batsmen to take a single
back of a length on leg stump, and Musakanda spots the length early. Ducks under this delivery and gets away from any apparent danger
good length on middle, and defended away to the off side
full outside off, and driven to mid off
back of a length on off, and that's been confidently punched down the ground to mid on
good length on off, and punched back to the bowler off the back foot
full on off, and Masakadza steps forward to defend towards cover
good length on off, and Masakadza shows some aggression! Comes skipping down the wicket to pull, but eventually checks his shot to the off side
full o off, and Masakadza hits a good-looking drive to cover. But a diving effort from the infielder stops the ball from going through, and saves a certain boundary for Pakistan
good length outside off, and going straight - without any deviation - into the gloves of Sarfraz
full on off, and turned off his pads to the leg side. Straight to midwicket though
good length on off, and turned off his hips to square leg. Nobody there, and enough time for the batsmen to jog back for two
back of a length on off, and that's been gently defended off the front foot
full outside off, and driven past Hasan Ali to the long-off boundary. Uses the bottom hand to generate some extra power, and plays with the bat's full follow through. A sight for sore eyes!
Hasan goes short for the final ball! Masakadza was expecting it, as he goes onto the back foot for the swipe over point, but the ball takes some extra bounce and goes over his bat to Sarfraz
full outside off, and comfortably driven to long off for a walking single
flighted onto middle stump, and Musakanda smothers a drive to the fielder at long on
full on middle, and pushed away from the turn to midwicket
length ball outside off, and he goes onto the back foot, before punching down to long on for one
full on leg, and he goes for the big sweep behind square. Slips while playing the shot, and the ball gets buried under his body
full on middle, but spinning into his legs. Pushed to midwicket with soft hands, but Mohammad Nawaz can't stop the single. Sarfraz isn't too happy, as expected
back of a length outside off, but Musakanda keeps his eyes on the ball, and dabs it to third man for one
good length outside off, and that's been steered to backward point off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and pulled away to deep midwicket
Too short! Even if Sarfraz was as tall as Andre The Giant, he wouldn't have had a chance to hold onto that delivery
length ball outside off, and he crunches a punch to the deep point fielder manning the boundary line
length but too wide outside off. Musakanda gets onto the back foot and slaps this behind point. No stopping that!
full outside off and he mistimes his attempted cover drive. Trickles back to the bowler
full toss on off stump, tapped to long-on off the toe-end
floated outside off, can't squeeze this drive past the bowler
slider, back of a length on off stump. He looks to punch it and gets an inside edge onto thigh
short of a length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and punches this to long-on's right
whack. Drops the legbreak very short and Masakadza is quickly onto his back foot to swing this away. Gets it well in front of deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, opens the face and steers to third man
length and in at off stump. Defended into the off side from the crease
length outside off, neatly punched to sweeper cover
short ball at the ribs, pulled to deep square. Wrists nicely on top of the ball to keep this down
another nice-looking pull. Short ball gives him plenty of time. He keeps it along the floor
short of a length in the corridor, can't nudge this through cover off the back foot as the ball slants in rapidly to get the inside half of the bat
slapped over wide long-on. Shadab might be having some trouble with control because of the cold. This one is a full toss, knee height outside off. A clean, full-blooded swing from the batsman
short and pushed through fast outside off. Punched to sweeper cover
full and flat outside off, driven back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
short outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
short again. A slider this time. He pulls it between deep midwicket and deep square
length outside off, punched to sweeper cover on the up
length ball angled in at off stump. Forces him to defend down the pitch
short ball outside off, can't get the cut past point
short ball outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot

big appeal and it's given! Is he a little unlucky there? Shuffles across and looks to flick a length ball. He's struck in front of middle and leg stump with the one that angles in. That could have been going down leg, but it's hard to tell. It doesn't matter - Hasan Ali rips to life his generator. He has broken the partnership.
length ball outside off, blocked on the front foot
full outside off, defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
slider, pushed full at middle stump. Driven back to the bowler
short ball outside off, cut to sweeper's right and he'll need to put in a slide after running to his left
short ball outside off, cut to sweeper cover off the back foot
another slider. Back of a length and catches the inside edge as he looks to flick this
length ball on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, clipped to deep square from the crease
short of a length outside off, sliced to point with the angle
short of a length and pushed across the channel. Left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, slashes away from the body and gets a thick outside edge down to third man
attempted googly doesn't land. Looks to whip it from off sutmp but toe-ends it to midwicket
full outside off, driven to extra cover
good length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
short outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
nicely tossed up. Length outside off and makes him reach out as he drives to extra cover. Imam sharp as ever there
short of a length outside off, under-edge to point as he looks to cut
short and wide outside off, gets the cut off the toe end and it rolls into the covers
beaten as he swishes at one without feet. Length ball fizzing wide outside off
short ball in the channel. Leaps to get on top of it and steers it into the gully region
short of a length and nicely punched past extra cover. Good balance and a high elbow. Sweeper cover has a long way to run to his right but he does and fields with a tumble
length ball wide outside off, left alone
glorious shot, but sweeper cover is there again to put in a slide. Leans into this length ball wide outside off and slices it past point
length ball just outside off, pushed into the covers off the front foot
length ball sliding in at the pads. Leans in, taps it to long-on on the up and brings up his 34th ODI fifty
loopy outside off, driven back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off from the crease
tossed up outside off, tapped to extra cover off the front foot
length ball on off. Comes on really slow off the pitch and Masakadza is forced to check his punch. Taps it back down the pitch
short and speared into the corridor. Defended off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball outside off, tapped to extra cover off the front foot
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
length ball angled in at leg stump, blocked into the leg side from the crease
leading edge as he mistimes a hook. Or is it the toe end? Either way, it flies safely between point and extra cover. That two-paced bounce again He's through the hook early
short of a length outside off, looks to punch through cover but it's mistimed and rolls back to the bowler
shot. Masakadza hitting through the leg side is quite a phenomenon. Plonks the front leg out into the off side and uses the angle to sweep him over the long leg boundary
length outside off, steps out and cops it on the pad outside off as he looks to flick
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off
length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
length outside off, driven to extra cover
length ball spinning in at leg stump, punched to long-on
floated up nicely outside off, driven against the turn to extra cover
length on off stump, leans in and flicks to long-on

high in the air and taken at deep midwicket. It's a good catch, this was really high and swerving to Asi Ali's left. He followed it and lunged low to his left to hold on. Masakadza was looking to swat Malik far over the leg side with a slog sweep but got it right off the toe end. A bad end to a good innings. He won't be happy in the manner it has come.
length ball on leg stump, flicked to midwicket on the up
full on off stump, plants the front leg across dangerously and just manages to flick this to square leg
length ball outside off, blocked into the off side
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off's left
length and in at leg stump. Defended from deep in the crease
length, in at middle stump, patted to midwicket off the back foot
short ball outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length ball outside off, blocked on the front foot
length ball on leg stump, punched to long-on on the up
length on off stump, punches towards long-on but Shadab sprints to his left from midwicket and stops with a dive
length outside off, spins back in a long way as he looks to drive through cover. Ends up at midwicket
short ball outside off, punched to long-off's right
length and in at off stump. Punched back to the bowler
nice hit. So classy. It's a length ball outside off and he's not to the pitch of this, but he has gauged the turn and swung through the line. Nice and straight over the bowler
short of a length outside off, chopped to point
short of a length outside off, nudged through cover off the back foot
good length and in at off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
length on off stump, sliced to point off the front foot
length outside off, punched through cover on the up
length and in at off stump, defended from the crease
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
length on leg stump, tapped to long-on off the back foot
leg stump, leans in and flicks to long leg
length ball wide outside off. Spins back in and he pushes down the pitch
full on off stump, driven against the turn to long-off
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
short of a length outside off, opens the face and chops to third man
bouncer too short to make him play. He ducks under it
bouncer just outside off, lets it go again
length ball outside off, slices to third man's right
oh nicely played. Pulls with control. It's short of a length and rising up outside off. Gets his hands through this and past midwicket
length outside off, sliced to point on the up
inside edge as he drives without putting a stride in. Full ball shaping dangerously in at the stumps
length ball on off stump, tapped into the covers from the crease
short ball at off stump, tapped to cover off the back foot

ooooffff! That's venomous from Moor! Slaughters this on the up and sweeper cover can't even make the 15 yards required to his right. It's a length ball wide outside off and he doesn't even bother with getting his feet out. Just reaches out and pummels it
venom from the bowler now. Bouncer slants in viciously at his right shoulder and he has to arch back to get out of the way
length on the hips, whipped to deep square
tossed up at off stump, driven back to the bowler
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
dropped short and spanked to the midwicket boundary. Too much time. Despite it spinning away from off stump, Murray can place this pull exactly where he wants
tossed up outside off, jammed out to long-off
length outside off, driven with the turn, on the up to extra cover
good length outside off, and extra bounce straightaway! Past Muray's attempted punch shot, and flies into Sarfraz's gloves
full on middle, and driven off the front foot to midwicket. Can't take the run though
full outside off, but angling into Murray's body. He sticks his bat out and punches this to mid off
back of a length outside off, and that's been cut away! Fast hands, but he hits it straight to point
length ball outside off, and punched to cover off the back foot. Another dot from Hasan
good length on middle, and pushed with the incoming angle to the leg side. The post-drinks session starts with a maiden over
good length outside off, and spinning into his body. Defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, and muscled with the spin to long off for a walking single
good length outside off, but spinning further away from the batsman. Left alone
full outside off, and driven with the spin to the sweeper fielder on the off side. Enough time to walk across for one
length ball outside off, and spinning away from Moor. Cut straight to point
good length on middle stump, and the wrong'un is tucked away to square leg off the back foot

through him! But Hasan Ali hurts his shoulder (or the back of his neck) trying to celebrate. Comic relief. Length ball on off that came in wildly after pitching. Murray tried to defend off the back foot but the ball went between bat and body, and crashed into the stumps
good length outside off, and left alone by the batsman. Shoulders his arms
good length on off, and angling into Tiripano's body. Somehow defends to the leg side with the ball getting big on him
good length outside off, and steered off the back foot to third man. Gets off the mark
full outside off, and a lovely shot from Moor that finds the fielder at cover. Sweet sound off the bat, but Pakistan have a packed infield on the off side
short on middle, and going over Moor's shoulders. The umpire thinks it's too high
back of a length on middle. But Moor makes some room, sticks his bat out, and then ramps it over third man! Oozing coolness
full on off, but it's the wrong'un. Tiripano drives down the ground, and Shadab manages to get his hands onto it
tossed up on off, and that entices Moor to go for the big slog sweep. Turns sharply away from him, and he misses the shot completely
good length on off, and this time Moor plays more carefully. Punched to mid on
full and wide outside off. Moor tries to drive, but the legspin takes the ball away from him. Through to Sarfraz
length ball outside off, and this has been punched through the covers to the fielder in the deep
full on off, and this flighted delivery is defended with soft hands to see the over out
good length on middle, and that's been dabbed away to the third-man fielder for a single
good length on off, and Tiripano defends off the back foot
full on middle, and that's been confidently driven straight down the ground. Mid off and mid on congregate, and Shoaib Malik eventually cuts it off
length ball on middle, but the around-the-wicket angle takes the ball down leg side
full on off, and his cover drive takes the bat's inside edge! Flies towards the leg side instead, and midwicket comes swooping in
full on off, and this has been tucked away to deep midwicket off the front foot
full on off, and driven down the ground. Offers the bat's full face, but can't beat the fielder at mid on
full outside off, and the wrong'un is driven to long off
full on off, and the legspinner is defended to cover point
more air this time, but the full-pitched delivery is driven to cover off the front foot
flighted outside off, and muscled away to Faheem at cover
flatter, and lands outside off. Spins further away, and Tiripano plays a late cut to short third man
length ball outside off, and the legspin is cut away past the fielder at point. Work for the man in the deep as Zimbabwe jog back for two
good length on middle and Moor defends off the back foot with soft hands
back of a length on off, but cramping into Moor's body. Defended again
yorker on middle and leg. Moor gets his toes out of the way and squeezes an ugly shot away to midwicket
good length on off, and tapped away - with soft hands - to short cover. Nobody's there, and off they go for a single
short on off, and he goes for the pull behind square. Top-edges it over Sarfraz's head, but the ball lands safe. Fine leg runs forward and cleans up
length ball on off that angles in. Moor misses the steer down to third man, and the ball hits his pad after an inside edge
length ball outside off, and that's been cut away off the back foot. Goes between gully and point, and the infielders go chasing after it. Hasan Ali manages to pull it in
tossed up outside off, and once again, driven down the ground to long off for one
full just outside off, and driven with the turn to wide long off
full, but wide outside off. Tiripano winds up, and thumps a cover drive through extra. Long off tries to intercept, but he scoops the ball into the boundary while attempting to field
good length outside off, and driven to point off the front foot
full on off, and Shadab ends the over with the wrong'un. Comes into Tiripano, but he manages to defend it away
good length on middle, but raps him on the thigh pad as he misses the flick. The ball trickles away to square leg, and the batsmen pick up a run
a pace bowler's dream ball! Yorker on middle, and the delivery uproots the middle stump. Tiripano backed away to try and make some room, but the ball went under his bat and sent him back for 13

on a hat-trick! Targets the stumps to the new batsman, and he's been trapped in front of middle. Full on off but with the ball angling in, and Roche can't connect with the back-foot defense. Played down the wrong line, and impact is in front of all three stumps. Out for a golden duck
full on leg, and that's been clipped off his pads to fine leg! Almost looked like pad first, but the umpire signals runs
good length outside off, and goes through his defenses! Lucky for him that the ball was outside the stump-line, and goes straight into Sarfraz's gloves
full outside off, and driven square off the front foot. Finds cover point though
short and wide, but Masakadza can't cut it away. Through his shot too early, and all he can do is under-cut it to the keeper
a yorker that's tailing in, but Masakadza whips this off his toes, and sends the ball racing away to the square-leg boundary! Classy shot
good length outside off, and he mistimes a cut shot to point. Calls very early for the single
good length on leg stump, and he clips it away to backward square leg for a single. Shoaib Malik the fielder in the deep
full on off, but the inswinging delivery is defended away to mid on
length ball outside off, and that's been pushed with the angled bat to third man
full on middle, and that's been defended to cover for a quick run
good length on off, and Moor picks this up from outside off, and pulls it over midwicket. Not muscled hard enough, and all he can collect is a double
full on leg stump, and Moor lifts it over long on! Backs away to the leg side, offers his bat's full face, and scoops it over the non-striker for six
length ball on off, and Moor backs away to make some room. Punches to cover thereafter
good length outside off, and that's been turned around the corner to midwicket
length ball on off, but the angles coming into Moor, and he has no trouble in working it to fine leg. Usman finishes with 4 for 36. A gun spell
slower ball, on a length outside leg. Moor taps it to the leg side and walks to take a single. But Amir goes running behind the delivery, and that forces Moor to backtrack
good length on leg stump again, and this time Moor plays it into the gap on the leg side. Work for the fielder at deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, and Masakadza tries to dab it down to third man. Played too square to point instead
almost a yorker on off stump, and Masakadza jams this shot into his toes. The ball trickles away to short midwicket thereafter

another full-pitched delivery, and this attempted whip takes the inside edge and goes down to fine leg. They want two runs, and it could be dangerous, but Amir's not backing up at the bowler's end and neither is any other fielder!
back of a length outside off, and Masakadza taps it off the back foot to the off side
length ball outside off, and he drills a cut to point. But Shadab's acrobatic dive to his left slows the ball down, and definitely saves his team three runs
full on middle, and pushed away to the leg side. They want the single, but Hasan runs to his left, picks up the ball, and throws down the stumps! Masakadza is a couple of feet away from the crease
good length on middle, and worked off his hips to deep backward square. A deserved fifty for Moor
full on leg stump, and that's been uncomfortably played to the leg side. No one there near square leg, and that allows Moor to get back on strike
yorker on middle stump, but Moor backs away and thumps it back to Hasan

length ball outside off, and Moor drags a flat-batted pull over the non-striker's head. In the air for a long time, and Shoaib Malik makes no mistake at long on. Hasan whimpers in his celebration. Probably that neck injury
full on off, and defended with soft hands. Back to Amir
attempted yorker on middle, and that's been clipped away to the mid-wicket region
full on middle, and the straight drive has been inside-edged onto his pads
full on middle, and driven with the bat's open face to deep point
full on leg stump, and gently pushed back to Amir off the front foot
yorker on off, but angling across the batsman. Just misses the base of off stump as Sarfraz collects the ball
swing and a miss! Length ball outside off, and he goes for a wild slog across the line. Misses completely

full on off, and this time the slog has gone straight to midwicket. The batsmen want the run, but Chatara is slow to get off the blocks. The fielder picks the ball up, aims at the stumps, and bull's eye!
oh glorious. Overpitched with some width outside off and he leans in to get to the pitch and caress this between extra cover and mid-off
beaten. Length slightly shorter this time and inviting him to drive again. He takes it on but hasn't transferred the weight into it this time. Slants past the outside edge
length ball outside off, left alone
short ball at the chest, gets inside the line and pulls to fine leg
short and wide outside off. Slapped through cover point on the up. Too easy.
short of a length and angled across him. Goes only-hands and nudges it past backward point
short and across the corridor, left alone
inside edge onto pad. Length ball outside off and he feels for it with an angled bat. Didn't try and get behind the line
length ball on leg stump, defended into the leg side with a closed face

escapes narrowly with both a catch and a run-out chance. Loses his presence of mind, Fakhar. Chips a length ball in front of square leg. He wasn't to the pitch of that ball to be playing the flick. As it's in the air and lands in front of the fielder at midwicket, he's ball-watching and meandering down the pitch. Runs halfway and is nowhere in the picture as the throw comes in. He misses though and Fakhar survives
full outside off, driven to mid-off's right
length on the pads, clipped to fine leg off the front
nicely played, but finds the fielder. Short and wide and he's nicely on top of this to play the cut
short on the hips. Nudged gently to fine leg's right for an easy two
short of a length on leg stump and once again, he gives fine leg some work to his right
short and wide and belted straight to cover. A fumble from the fielder but Imam knows his basics. Won't run off that misfield
length and just wide of the corridor. Left alone
length on off stump, gets behind the line and taps towards mid-on with the full face
length ball slanted across off stump. Tapped back down the pitch
length ball outside off, expansive drive on the up. Can't get it past cover
short and wide outside. Whacked straight cover with a flat-bat. But there's another fumble
length and across the corridor, left alone
short outside off, defended to point off the back foot
short of a length and lifting up at off stump. Defended off the back foot
inswinger at a length in the corridor. Gets on the back foot and slices to third man
well timed. Shuffles across into the off side and uses the angle into him to punch one wide of mid-on off the back foot
beaten. Full and wide outside off, stretches a long way for the cover drive and is beaten. This one doesn't come in with the angle
short and very wide outside off. Left alone
short of a length outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
poor ball. A nice over undone. Short and about hip height. He watches it come on and pulls to the midwicket boundary
short of a length outside off, punched to mid-off off the back foot

thick outside edge falls short of third man. Once again, the steepness of a regular Muzarabani length ball troubles Fakhar. Chucks his hands to try and drill this through cover but is in a woeful position
short of a length at off stump, tapped into the covers
length on off stump, sliced into the off side off the front foot
short of a length in the corridor. Left alone
length ball in the corridor, goes down to third man off the outside half as he looks to defend
gets it right this time and breaches the infield. Fakhar more patient this time, gets the front leg out of the way of this length ball to make some room and plays late as he punches wide of mid-off
short ball in the corridor. Looks to pull wide of mid-on, but gets it off the toe-end
beauty. Short of a length outside off and once again, patience works. Springs into it by getting on his toes, opens his wrists late as he gets tall, and punches firmly between point and cover
forceful this time and on the other side of point. Too much width. He slashes on the up and gets it wide of third man
length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length outside off, stabbed to extra cover
short of a length in the channel, nudged to point off the back foot
length outside off, left alone
nicely placed. Short ball outside off, allows it to come and and cuts to third man's left
short of a length and across off stump, left alone

oh yes. Nicely played. Picks the length and leans in outside off to tap this wide of mid-off. But Roche sprints a long way and puts dive in from five yards to swim across the turf and pull this back in. Lovely stuff.
short of a length outside off, pushed to mid-off on the up
raps him on the pad. Fakhar shakes his head. Once again he's done by the rise off the pitch. Looks to flick and can't get bat on it
short and wide outside off. Cut to third man who is a lot squarer now
length ball on off stump, dead-batted into the pitch
length ball at off stump, pushed to mid-off on the up
length and wide outside off. Opens his arms up and slaps it hard, straight to extra cover
swivels and hooks to the square leg fence. Short ball doesn't rise menacingly enough and he makes easy work of it
inside edge past off stump as he looks to drive with an angled bat, with a gap between bat and pad. Length ball slanted across off and he was looking to go through cover
top edge as this bouncer lifts up at his helmet. Hurriedly hooks under it but not in control at all. Gets it fine in the end
short of a length at off, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside, under-edges a cut to gully
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short ball on the hips. Looks to glance it, cops it on the thigh guard
short of a length outside off, sliced to third man
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to fine leg off the toes
short ball slanted across off stump. Thinks of the upper cut but withdraws
full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler on the bounce
length on leg stump, dabbed to midwicket
length on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg
short of a length in the corridor, tapped into the covers
length on middle, blocked off the front foot
length on off stump, blocked into the covers
short of a length outside off, tapped to cover
length on the stumps, dead-batted into the pitch
too short and he whacks it off the front foot. Well outside off and he sweeper cover has no chance to his left
short of a length outside off, steps out and chops to sweeper cover
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
length on off stump, jabbed to mid-off on the up
bouncer on middle stump, pulled to deep square leg's right
offcutter, full on off stump, driven straight to extra cover
get out of the way. Geez. He has slaughtered this short ball. Short and outside off and he's dragged it to the midwicket boundary
length on middle stump, tapped into the off side
tossed up at middle stump, driven down to long-on
back of a length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, stays deep in the crease and carves it to the point boundary
short of a length and in at leg stump. Punched to long-on off the back foot
full on leg stump, tapped to midwicket's left off the inside half
short and at leg stump, punched to long-on from deep in the crease
oh well placed. Lobbed up full outside off. Allows it to land, gets to the pitch and punches between cover and extra
short ball outside off, cut straight to point
length ball wide outside off, leans in to drive to long-off
length ball on leg stump, gets deep in the crease and deflects it fine
length ball outside off, pushed to mid-off off the front foot
length on leg stump, driven to long-on
poor bowling. Short and wide outside off. He waits for it slide in with the arm and carves it past short third man to bring up his fifty
full on off stump, driven to long-off
floated up at off stump, driven to long-off
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
short of a length slider in the corridor. He's hurried as he pulls, but there's no one at deep midwicket. Long-on runs around
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off from around the wicket. Uses the angle to open up his stance and drive expertly to long-off's right
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
well played. Length ball fired in flat across him and he crouches to open the face and get this past short third man
nicely done at extra cover. Brian Chari leaps to his left and stops a potential boundary. Dropped very short and wide and this is punched hard
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off stump, flicked back to the bowler
full outside off, and slapped square off the front foot. Had four written all over it, but point dives to his left and intercepts. Clean work from Musakanda
good length on middle, and Imam comfortably runs it down to third man
good length on leg stump, and he nudges this off his pads to deep backward square leg
full on off, and this has been muscled through the covers. Fielder in the deep though
good length on off, and just too easy for these two set batsmen. Dabs this down to third man for the second time in the over
fuller, but wide outside off. Fakhar opens his stance, and slaps this through the covers to the man in the deep. Time for drinks as well
good length on leg stump, and that's been punched off the back foot to mid on
full on leg stump, and driven to the leg side
full on middle, and that's been slogged to the leg side. Man in the deep though
flicked off his pads to deep midwicket for a walking single
length ball on middle, and he makes room to try and punch it past cover. Finds the fielder though
full outside leg, and down he goes - on one knee - to sweep this behind square. Trickles down to fine leg
full outside off, and driven through the off side. Pierces the gap past extra cover, and the fielder in the deep is a mere spectator
good length on off, and tapped off the front foot to point
length ball on off, and Fakhar backs away to make some room. The ball's still too close to his body, so Fakhar steers it to point off the back foot
slower ball, wide outside off, and cut away to point for a single
full on off, and driven down the ground to mid off. They take off for a quick single
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point. Fakhar says no to the single though
good length on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep fine leg
good length on leg stump, and Imam flicks this off his hips to midwicket
good length on leg stump, and nudged off his hips to fine leg. They jog across for a single

Harakiri! Full on middle, and Fakhar defends with soft hands. The ball stays near Fakhar's toes, and off they go for a single. The bowler runs towards the ball, picks it up, and then breaks the stumps, but Imam's dive should save him. But oh wait, looks like Imam's bat is in the air. It's crossed the crease, but it hasn't been grounded at all. What a terrible way to get out. There's the breakthrough
full on middle, and defended away to get off the mark
full on middle, and defended off the back foot to see the over out
good length on middle, and defended off the back foot
good length on off, and defended off the front foot
good length on middle, and worked off his pads to the leg side. Goes to the man in the deep
full just outside off, and driven to cover off the front foot. They take off for a single
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to point. Finds the fielder
full on off, and driven to the on side off the front foot. Finds the fielder at midwicket
full on middle stump, and driven down the ground to mid on. Finds the fielder
short outside off, and cut away to the deep point fielder
good length on middle, but angling across the batsman's body. Fakhar tried to pull but the ball goes over his bat
quick! Full on off, and Fakhar leans into a slap-drive through the vovers. But straight to Tiripano
full outside off, and drilled through the covers. Proper bat speed to slap this away to the extra cover boundary
full on off, and spinning into Babar. He smothers it to the leg side for a quick single
full on leg, and he sweeps - down on one knee - to deep backward square leg
tossed up outside off, but Babar takes a big stride forward, and drives through the ball's line. Deep extra cover cleans up
good length on off, and that's been carved off the back foot. Brian Chari, at deep extra cover, races around the boundary and stops the four
good length on leg stump, and punched down the ground to long off. Just a single
full on leg stump, and Babar can't whip this away. Hits his front leg, but impact's outside the stumps. The bowler appeals, but not given
good length on off, and angling across the batsman. Swing and a miss from Fakhar
full on off, and driven away from his body. Goes straight to cover
full on off, and that's been hit straight back to the bowler with the straight bat. The bowler sticks his right leg out and stops the ball from going past him
good length outside leg, and Fakhar tries to clip this fine down the leg side. Mistimes it in that direction as the ball rolls away to short fine leg. Keeper goes chasing after it
back of a length outside off, and cut away off the back foot. Can't pierce the gap though
slower ball, on a length outside off. Babar tries to run this fine to third man, but he can't make the connection. Through to the keeper on the bounce
too full on leg stump, and that's been swept away - down on one knee - to the backward square boundary. Super shot
good length on middle, defended off the back foot
full outside leg, and Fakhar shapes away to try and slog. But the ball's too full, and therefore he check-punches to midwicket
good length on middle, and Fakhar tries to carve it away past point. Finds the fielder though
full on off, and driven off the front foot. Goes to extra cover
good length on middle, and turned off his pads to the deep fielder on the leg side. Enough time to stroll to the other side and collect the run
back of a length on middle, and soaring over Fakhar's head. No trouble for the umpire to call wide for height
length ball on middle, and punched to mid off. The fielder there is no the circle, and therefore Fakhar can take a safe single despite the ball going to the man
good length on middle, and flicked away off the pads to deep midwicket
full on off, and fended away to cover off the front foot
good length on middle, and punched off the back foot. Straight to midwicket though
full and wide outside off. Fakhar reaches at it, and mistimes a drive to the fielder at cover
full outside off, and driven away with the angled bat. Point gets his finger to it, and that slows the ball down, but the batsmen get a single anyway
slower through the air. Full on middle, and fended back to the bowler
length ball on middle, and tapped down the ground to wide long off
good length on middle, and cut away off the back foot. Goes down to the point fielder in the deep
full on off, and driven down the ground. The bowler runs to his left and intercepts
full on off, and defended off the front foot
good length on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
good length outside off, but Babar picks the wrong'un well. The ball comes into the batsman, and Babar cuts it past point to the fielder in the deep
full outside leg, and defended off the front foot
full outside leg, and Fakhar drives with the spin to long off
good length outside off, and cut away off the back foot. Two more for Babar as Muzarabani runs around the boundary line
slower through the air, and this time he taps it to point. They rotate the strike
full on leg, and swept away behind square. Blocked by short fine leg with Fakhar on 93
full on middle, and Babar takes a big stride forward to defend
full on middle again, and Babar takes a few steps in front to defend
length ball outside off, and angling into Babar. Defended off the back foot this time
full outside off, and driven to the deep extra cover fielder. Two men there in fact, but the ball sneaks through between them! Roche's diving effort just not good enough
full on middle, and defended away to the leg side
good length on middle, and flicked away to short fine leg
full on middle, and tapped away to the leg side. Straight to midwicket
overpitched on middle, and driven down the ground to long on
full on middle, and swept away! Man in the deep, but he dives over this ball. Did place it really well, but the fielder had put in the hard yards to get to the ball. Moves on to 97
good length on off, and cut away with the turn to deep point
full on middle, and driven to mid on off the front foot
full on off, and Babar comes down the wicket to flick. Played to midwicket
good length on leg stump, and worked away to short fine leg. Babar says no to the single
good length on middle, and the punch has been mistimed to cover
good length outside leg, and Fakhar bunts this down to long on for a walking single
full on off, and driven down the ground to long off. Gives Fakhar the strike

there's the hundred! His second in ODIs. Full on leg once again, and Fakhar comfortably nudges it to fine leg. A very sedate celebration, but the Pakistan boys in the pavillion give him a rousing applause
full outside leg stump, and Fakhar goes further down leg to try and make some room. Mistimes a drive to the leg side instead
good length on off, and turning away from Fakhar. He slaps it away to the man in the deep for a single
good length on off, and that's been pulled along the ground by Babar for a single. Men manning the boundary line on the leg side
short outside off, and cut away hard and fast! Straight to point though
tossed up outside off, and Fakhar can't resist! Goes for the slog sweep, but the ball goes over his bat. Smart work from the keeper
good length outside off, and carved away to cover
full outside off, and Fakhar connects with the big shot. Thumps a hard drive down the ground, but straight to wide long off
aimed at his legs, and Fakhar - once again - flicks it off his pads to square leg
full outside off, and he comes down the ground to drive to long off
full on leg stump, and Fakhar taps this down the ground to long of. Dealing in singles now
good length outside off, and cut away
length ball on off, and he tries to cut this behind point. Goes to the fielder there on the bounce though
full on leg, and tapped to the vacant leg side region for a quick single

good length on leg, and he flicks it straight to short fine leg. Could've been a catch, but the fielder there drops it! Deceived by the slower ball and Fakhar scoops this by mistake. Tendai Chitara the guilty man
good length on leg, and he taps this away to point. Wants a single, but Babar sends him back. One run-out is enough per game, reckons the Pakistan batsmen
full and wide outside off. Saw Fakhar coming down the wicket, and delivers this slightly wider than usual. Fakhar properly deceived as the ball goes through to Murray, the keeper
back of a length on leg, and nudged off the back foot to the vacant fine-leg region
length ball on middle, and going through to the keeper as Fakhar tries to ramp it over
full and wide outside off again, and Fakhar can't reach at this ball. It's inside the tramlines and the umpire says that's a legal ball. Over
full on off, and drilled down the ground to long off. A walking single
good length outside leg, and Fakhar misses the cut shot. The ball goes under his bat, and then through the keeper's legs for a bye
full on middle, and he sweeps this fine down the leg side! Placed to perfection, and deep midwicket just can't cut it off
good length outside off, and cut away to the point boundary. Makes some extra room, and sends this into the boundary. Scores tied
good length on leg, and fended back to the bowler
short and wide down the leg side, and that's the end! Pakistan win by nine wickets.
